Scene:
Moritsuna's War Camp (See also Love for Koshiro and Moritsuna Identifies a Head)
(Moritsuna jinya (See also Koshirō on'ai and Moritsuna kubi jikken) / 盛綱陣屋 (See also 小四郎恩愛 and 盛綱首実検))

Play: The Battle of Sakamoto Castle (近江源氏先陣館)

Production: September 1969

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danroku VIII (see also Tsuruzawa Kanji VII) (竹沢団六 (八))

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))
